title.rendered: WHY THIS IS THE BEST TIME TO PLAN YOUR PAINTING AND DECORATING PROJECT

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Why this is the best time to plan your painting and decorating project” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Here at The Good Painter, our painters and decorators are here now more than ever to assist you in your painting and decorating needs, as well as enlightening you with some expert tips and knowledge to apply during this time. If this isn’t the perfect time to plan your longing residential painting and decorating project, then we’re not sure what is! Create a haven and the interior you’ll feel most comfortable in, as we focus being indoors and growing as individuals and designing a home which will keep you positive and motivated! Why is this the best time to plan your painting and decorating job? Our painting and decorating team are here to help you prepare!

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Planning your painting and decorating project” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.farrow-ball.com%2Fpaint-colours%2Fst-giles-blue||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”5581″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

When planning a painting and decorating project in your London home, there are many elements and themes which need to be explored. Avoid the urge and sense of rush and spend this time in thinking and finalising your plan to create the perfect residential space through painting and decorating!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]1. Consider your budget – It is critical to approach a realistic and honest mindset to your finance before planning your renovation and transformation. Our painters and decorators work with suppliers such as Farrow & Ball, Little Greene and Dulux, depending on what fits your desired budget. You want your painting and home renovations to last a long time, so consider high-quality products to avoid another soon renewal.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

2. Layout and rearranging space – As you are now more observant of your home and are aware of minor details which might need a bit of touching up, you can create and go through a list of everything you wish to renovate, change and modify. Want your house to feel larger? Subtle changes, such as painting with lighter shades, will enlarge your room and add more light.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

3. Suppliers – Our painters and decorators may not have the complete freedom to go to stores and purchase or view paints; however, suppliers are still delivering products to your home while your order them online. Now is the perfect time to explore some paint options which you can test for your painting and decorating project! Order a few samples to test in your desired room; this will allow you to have a clear vision of the perfect paint colour that suits your interior.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”5582″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Examine and explore your options deeper as you focus more indoors and identify any problem areas which can be beneficial to you and your family. Need an office or study which will allow you to concentrate? Blue tones will help you relax, and green shades will encourage you to keep being motivated. You may also read more on colour psychology and find the best paint colours to portray a certain feeling and stay productive within the office workspace.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Our painting and decoration company is here to assist you and offer our high-quality services as much as we can during this time. The Good Painter can help as we provide online and phone consultations to help you have a jump start in planning your painting and decorating project. Our London painters and decorators follow the best procedure to complete your painting and decorating services and ensure you are living in an environment which is comfortable, positive and in its best light. Using platform Zoom for video calling, we are here to view your home and discuss your painting and decorating projects. If you have any queries and need clarifications, you can contact us online and get a quote today![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
